verses.name: Acts 19:25
verses.text: Whom he called together with the workmen of like occupation, and said, Sirs, ye know that by this craft we have our wealth.

verses.name: Acts 19:26
verses.text: Moreover ye see and hear, that not alone at Ephesus, but almost throughout all Asia, this Paul hath persuaded and turned away much people, saying that they be no gods, which are made with hands:

verses.name: Acts 19:27
verses.text: So that not only this our craft is in danger to be set at nought; but also that the temple of the great goddess Diana should be despised, and her magnificence should be destroyed, whom all Asia and the world worshippeth.
